metadata.description: Once a child-star sidekick, Kid Caliber is Lovebunny, a college dropout trying to make it big in the world of superheroes. Unfortunately, she has no special powers and keeps finding herself in poor team-ups that never result in the fame or fortune she desires. Her luck seems to change when a friendly police detective (motivated more by romance than confidence) calls her onto a case. While she is able to solve the problem she is presented with, she creates a bigger one for herself by befriending an escaped demon from hell in the process.
metadata.name: Lovebunny and Mr. Hell (Image)
